--------------------------------------------
Deep learning: From academia to practice using micro services
--------------------------------------------
You will learn how deep learning models have driven the evolution of artificial intelligence, towards the development of means of transformation that allow achieving new levels of optimization and development in the industry, thanks to the adoption of architectures oriented to micro-services.
About PyCon Colombia 2018
--------------------------------------------------

We are excited to share this overview of the second edition of Colombia’s Python Conference: PyCon Colombia 2018  - http://bit.ly/overview-pyconcolombia2018

We want to say thanks to all our sponsors who helped make the conference a huge success.
